reviews.review_msg: She is happy to help students during office hours. However, the marking of assignments were not fair, while the exams marking were okay. The most difficult thing of taking this course from her was the contents and forms within lecture notes, assignments, and exams were not correlated at all! You need some expert inspirations to build connections.

I do admire the course is hard.and I know she cant speak english very well,but she tried her best.do not miss her class,it take lots of time to understand the material by yourself, she is super helpful during her office hour,if u come to her office alot,u definitely will get good mark
His grading scheme is too strict and weird.
"There are 2 kinds of people in the world. Those that can infer from missing information..."
Stay on top of the assignments and you will do well. Overall great professor

The class was incredibly interesting. It was a lot of work, but definitely manageable if you attend class and pay attention. I really enjoyed his teaching style. Great prof and great class. Really approachable and helpful. Just another bonus, he has low tolerance for  students that disrupt the class, which is something I really appreciate..
